name: Drone Ikuze
description: Drone Ikuze is a 3D fast-paced single-player arcade game. Take part in this exciting adventure with us. Test your reflexes, dodge missiles coming at you. It features clean layout and fast-paced game. We want you to have more screen space for the actual gameplay. Check out our first trailer and want to thank you for your support! We are also on Steam Greenlight!
